verses.verse: Moreover the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> came unto me, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Now, thou son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, wilt thou judge <WH8199> <WH8799>, wilt thou judge <WH8199> <WH8799> the bloody <WH1818> city <WH5892>? yea, thou shalt shew <WH3045> <WH8689> her all her abominations <WH8441>.

Then say <WH559> <WH8804> thou, Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>, The city <WH5892> sheddeth <WH8210> <WH8802> blood <WH1818> in the midst <WH8432> of it, that her time <WH6256> may come <WH935> <WH8800>, and maketh <WH6213> <WH8804> idols <WH1544> against herself to defile <WH2930> <WH8800> herself.

Thou art become guilty <WH816> <WH8804> in thy blood <WH1818> that thou hast shed <WH8210> <WH8804>; and hast defiled <WH2930> <WH8804> thyself in thine idols <WH1544> which thou hast made <WH6213> <WH8804>; and thou hast caused thy days <WH3117> to draw near <WH7126> <WH8686>, and art come <WH935> <WH8799> even unto thy years <WH8141>: therefore have I made <WH5414> <WH8804> thee a reproach <WH2781> unto the heathen <WH1471>, and a mocking <WH7048> to all countries <WH776>.
Those that be near <WH7138>, and those that be far <WH7350> from thee, shall mock <WH7046> <WH8691> thee, which art infamous <WH2931> <WH8034> and much <WH7227> vexed <WH4103>.
Behold, the princes <WH5387> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, every one <WH376> were in thee to their power <WH2220> to shed <WH8210> <WH8800> blood <WH1818>.

In thee have they set light <WH7043> <WH8689> by father <WH1> and mother <WH517>: in the midst <WH8432> of thee have they dealt <WH6213> <WH8804> by oppression <WH6233> with the stranger <WH1616>: in thee have they vexed <WH3238> <WH8689> the fatherless <WH3490> and the widow <WH490>.
Thou hast despised <WH959> <WH8804> mine holy things <WH6944>, and hast profaned <WH2490> <WH8765> my sabbaths <WH7676>.

In thee are men <WH582> that carry tales <WH7400> to shed <WH8210> <WH8800> blood <WH1818>: and in thee they eat <WH398> <WH8804> upon the mountains <WH2022>: in the midst <WH8432> of thee they commit <WH6213> <WH8804> lewdness <WH2154>.
In thee have they discovered <WH1540> <WH8765> their fathers <WH1> ' nakedness <WH6172>: in thee have they humbled <WH6031> <WH8765> her that was set apart <WH5079> for pollution <WH2931>.

And one <WH376> hath committed <WH6213> <WH8804> abomination <WH8441> with his neighbour's <WH7453> wife <WH802>; and another <WH376> hath lewdly <WH2154> defiled <WH2930> <WH8765> his daughter in Torah <WH3618>; and another <WH376> in thee hath humbled <WH6031> <WH8765> his sister <WH269>, his father's <WH1> daughter <WH1323>.

In thee have they taken <WH3947> <WH8804> gifts <WH7810> to shed <WH8210> <WH8800> blood <WH1818>; thou hast taken <WH3947> <WH8804> usury <WH5392> and increase <WH8636>, and thou hast greedily gained <WH1214> <WH8762> of thy neighbours <WH7453> by extortion <WH6233>, and hast forgotten <WH7911> <WH8804> me, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>.

Behold, therefore I have smitten <WH5221> <WH8689> mine hand <WH3709> at thy dishonest gain <WH1215> which thou hast made <WH6213> <WH8804>, and at thy blood <WH1818> which hath been in the midst <WH8432> of thee.

Can thine heart <WH3820> endure <WH5975> <WH8799>, or can thine hands <WH3027> be strong <WH2388> <WH8799>, in the days <WH3117> that I shall deal <WH6213> <WH8802> with thee? I the YY <WH3068> have spoken <WH1696> <WH8765> it, and will do <WH6213> <WH8804> it.

And I will scatter <WH6327> <WH8689> thee among the heathen <WH1471>, and disperse <WH2219> <WH8765> thee in the countries <WH776>, and will consume <WH8552> <WH8689> thy filthiness <WH2932> out of thee.

And thou shalt take thine inheritance <WH2490> <WH8738> <WH8676> <WH5157> <WH8765> in thyself in the sight <WH5869> of the heathen <WH1471>, and thou shalt know <WH3045> <WH8804> that I am the YY <WH3068>.
And the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> came unto me, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, the house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> is to me become dross <WH5509>: all they are brass <WH5178>, and tin <WH913>, and iron <WH1270>, and lead <WH5777>, in the midst <WH8432> of the furnace <WH3564>; they are even the dross <WH5509> of silver <WH3701>.

Therefore thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Because ye are all become dross <WH5509>, behold, therefore I will gather <WH6908> <WH8802> you into the midst <WH8432> of Yerushalayim <WH3389>.

As they gather <WH6910> silver <WH3701>, and brass <WH5178>, and iron <WH1270>, and lead <WH5777>, and tin <WH913>, into the midst <WH8432> of the furnace <WH3564>, to blow <WH5301> <WH8800> the fire <WH784> upon it, to melt <WH5413> <WH8687> it; so will I gather <WH6908> <WH8799> you in mine anger <WH639> and in my fury <WH2534>, and I will leave <WH3240> <WH8689> you there, and melt <WH5413> <WH8689> you.
Yea, I will gather <WH3664> <WH8765> you, and blow <WH5301> <WH8804> upon you in the fire <WH784> of my wrath <WH5678>, and ye shall be melted <WH5413> <WH8738> in the midst <WH8432> thereof.

As silver <WH3701> is melted <WH2046> in the midst <WH8432> of the furnace <WH3564>, so shall ye be melted <WH5413> <WH8714> in the midst <WH8432> thereof; and ye shall know <WH3045> <WH8804> that I the YY <WH3068> have poured out <WH8210> <WH8804> my fury <WH2534> upon you.
And the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> came unto me, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,
Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, say <WH559> <WH8798> unto her, Thou art the land <WH776> that is not cleansed <WH2891> <WH8794>, nor rained <WH1656> upon in the day <WH3117> of indignation <WH2195>.

There is a conspiracy <WH7195> of her prophets <WH5030> in the midst <WH8432> thereof, like a roaring <WH7580> <WH8802> lion <WH738> ravening <WH2963> <WH8802> the prey <WH2964>; they have devoured <WH398> <WH8804> souls <WH5315>; they have taken <WH3947> <WH8799> the treasure <WH2633> and precious things <WH3366>; they have made her many <WH7235> <WH8689> widows <WH490> in the midst <WH8432> thereof.

Her Kohanim <WH3548> have violated <WH2554> <WH8804> my Torah <WH8451>, and have profaned <WH2490> <WH8762> mine holy things <WH6944>: they have put no difference <WH914> <WH8689> between the holy <WH6944> and profane <WH2455>, neither have they shewed <WH3045> <WH8689> difference between the unclean <WH2931> and the clean <WH2889>, and have hid <WH5956> <WH8689> their eyes <WH5869> from my sabbaths <WH7676>, and I am profaned <WH2490> <WH8735> among <WH8432> them.

Her princes <WH8269> in the midst <WH7130> thereof are like wolves <WH2061> ravening <WH2963> <WH8802> the prey <WH2964>, to shed <WH8210> <WH8800> blood <WH1818>, and to destroy <WH6> <WH8763> souls <WH5315>, to get <WH1214> <WH8800> dishonest gain <WH1215>.

And her prophets <WH5030> have daubed <WH2902> <WH8804> them with untempered <WH8602> morter, seeing <WH2374> vanity <WH7723>, and divining <WH7080> <WH8802> lies <WH3577> unto them, saying <WH559> <WH8802>, Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>, when the YY <WH3068> hath not spoken <WH1696> <WH8765>.

The people <WH5971> of the land <WH776> have used oppression <WH6231> <WH8804> <WH6233>, and exercised <WH1497> <WH8804> robbery <WH1498>, and have vexed <WH3238> <WH8689> the poor <WH6041> and needy <WH34>: yea, they have oppressed <WH6231> <WH8804> the stranger <WH1616> wrongfully <WH4941>.

And I sought <WH1245> <WH8762> for a man <WH376> among them, that should make up <WH1443> <WH8802> the hedge <WH1447>, and stand <WH5975> <WH8802> in the gap <WH6556> before <WH6440> me for the land <WH776>, that I should not destroy <WH7843> <WH8763> it: but I found <WH4672> <WH8804> none.

Therefore have I poured out <WH8210> <WH8799> mine indignation <WH2195> upon them; I have consumed <WH3615> <WH8765> them with the fire <WH784> of my wrath <WH5678>: their own way <WH1870> have I recompensed <WH5414> <WH8804> upon their heads <WH7218>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>.
